kit101.turtle

Class TurtleApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • kit101.turtle.TurtleApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, InteractiveWorld, TurtleWorld

    public class TurtleApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements InteractiveWorld
    A turtle graphics world that can be used in a browser or added to a container.
    See Also:
